#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<string.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define rep(i,n) for(typeof(n) i = 0;i<n;i++)
#define range(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i = a;i<=b;i++)
#define tr(it,c) for(typeof(c.begin()) it = c.begin();it!= c.end();++it)
#define setbits(x) __builtin_popcount(x)
#define gcd(x,y) __gcd(x,y)
#define x first
#define y second
#define author dipjal
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vii;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<pii> vpii;
typedef map<int,int> mii;
const int SIZE = 1e6+5;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const ll epf = -1e5+9;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
vector<int> P;
vector<int> Q;
map<int,int> mtp;
//int P[SIZE],Q[SIZE];
int tree[SIZE];
int arr[SIZE];
int N,K;
 
inline int scan(){
    int x = 0;
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9') c = getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
       x*=10;
       x+=(c-'0');
        c = getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return x;
}
 
 
inline void print(ll x){
    char str[25];
    int i = 0;
    do{
        str[i++]=(char)(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    --i;
    while(i>=0) putchar_unlocked(str[i--]);
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}
 
 
 
 
 
void update(int idx,int val){
    while(idx<=SIZE){
            tree[idx]+=val;
    idx+=(idx&(-idx));
    }
}
 
ll query(int idx){
    ll sum = 0LL;
    while(idx>0){
            sum+=tree[idx];
    idx-=(idx&(-idx));
    }
    return sum;
}
 
void fuck(){
    int cnt = 0;
    for(int i = 0;i<N;i++){
        for(int j = i+1;j<N;j++){
            if(arr[j]<arr[i])
            cnt++;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n",cnt);
} 

int val(int i){
    return((i*(i+1))/2);
}

#define gbm 8388608



int fmult[25];
void pre(){
    fmult[0]=0;
    fmult[1]=1;
    for(int i = 2;i<23;i++){
        fmult[i] = val(i);
        for(int j = 1;j<i;j++){
            fmult[i]=(fmult[i]*2)%gbm;
        }
        fmult[i]=(fmult[i]+fmult[i-1])%gbm;
    }
        
    }
 
int main(){
int tt;
   // scanf("%d",&N);
  string s;
  char c;
  cin>>s;
  cin>>c;
  int flag[26]={0};
  int cnt = 0;
  for(int i = 0;i<sz(s);i++)
  cnt+=s[i]==c;
  cout<<cnt<<endl;
  return 0;
}
